meanings.sent1: The skunk's gassiest moment made everyone run away.
meanings.sent2: The factory's gassiest machine was causing pollution.
meanings.sent3: The gassiest balloon at the party popped with a loud bang.
meanings.sent4: The old car, gassiest of them all, chugged along the road.
meanings.sent5: The gassiest smell in the room was coming from the kitchen.

meanings.definition: Having the highest level of gas production
meanings.sent1: The gassiest cow in the barn was always mooing.
meanings.sent2: The gassiest area of the swamp was bubbling with methane.
meanings.sent3: The gassiest soda bottle fizzed over when opened.
meanings.sent4: The gassiest volcano in the region erupted with fury.
meanings.sent5: The gassiest planet in the solar system is known for its rings.

meanings.definition: Tending to produce the most gas
meanings.sent1: The gassiest food at the fair gave everyone gas.
meanings.sent2: The gassiest dog in the park was wagging its tail happily.
meanings.sent3: The gassiest balloon animal at the party deflated suddenly.
meanings.sent4: The gassiest cloud in the sky looked like a fluffy sheep.
meanings.sent5: The gassiest flower in the garden attracted many bees.
